Description.Text: The Victor is a small and idyllic family-run hotel that welcomes you to stay in a pleasant and warm atmosphere. The hotel offers a range of tastefully furnished and affordable rooms of varying facilities and sizes. During leisure, guests can explore the beautiful city and its attractions.

The Victor Hotel is situated in the heart of Victoria, one of London's central most prestigious areas. The hotel offers easy access to some of the capital's greatest attractions, such as Buckingham Palace, Big Ben, Houses of Parliament and the Tate Gallery.

Single Room - Room offers a single bed with color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
Double Room - Room offers a double bed with color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
Twin Room - Room offers 2 single beds with color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
Triple Room - Room offers a double bed and a single bed with color TV, ensuite/private bathroom, hairdryer, tea and coffee making facilities and telephone.
